attributes.action: raise more awareness of Mental Health in secondary schools!
attributes.additional_details: the levels of mental health is rising and this need to change, teenagers are not aware of the start of a mental health situation and awareness needs to be made and stop teenagers from being sensitive and naive to the situation.
attributes.background: create a service that allows teenagers to express how they feel within school with compulsory lessons within the curriculum to raise awareness of mental health.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you would like the Government to raise more awareness of mental health in Secondary Schools.

You might like to sign this petition instead. It calls for mental health to be added to the national curriculum:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/165263
